attributes.action: Expel Knowsley Councillor Mike Kearns due to his recent conviction for Drink Driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Councillor Mike Kearns, Councillor for the Longview ward in the Knowsley Borough on Merseyside, was recently found guilty of drink driving at St Helens court on Tuesday the 28th of August. 

A Knowsley Council spokeswoman has stated that Mr Kearns does not have to resign, citing that "having certain criminal records does not bar you from becoming a councillor."

We believe that he has "conducted himself in a manner which could reasonably be regarded as bringing his office or authority into disrepute.”
and this involves a failure to comply with the authority’s code of conduct and that Councillor Kearns should be expelled or resign immediately.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
